channel.title: Problems with my Portforwarding + ip changed auto! strange! plz help?
channel.description: hi, yesterday i had my own server i forwarded my port for my runeserver and it worked fine peaple enjoyed the game bat i waked up and after school i,l started my server and i wanted to play my server and i get connecting error or samthing like dat sow i go to cmd ipconfig and i sa my ip was changed sow i changed it the port and that everything and i trayed to get in i can connect to my server bat other peaple cant wots wong il show you an pickture :confused: il give you an pickture of my portforward image wot settings i have new my router is a DV-2020 ADSL can samone help me plz my msn is ghostrevan@hotmail.com plz help!!! the image link is here->[url=http://img411.imageshack.us/my.php?image=helpmedr3.png]http://img411.imageshack.us/my.php?image=helpmedr3.png[/url] [img][/img]

item.title: Problems with my Portforwarding + ip changed auto! strange! plz help?
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

Can you please talk like a normal person. I mean seriously. It took me alot longer than it should have to read that. Iâ€™m sorry if it seems like I am flaming. But please talk like a normal person.

First. You can not connect using your NO-IP address. You should join using 127.0.0.1.
Try to have a friend connect to your no-ip address.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with my Portforwarding + ip changed auto! strange! plz help?
item.dc:creator: @zezimaisme111 zezimaisme111
item.description:
@zezimaisme111 wrote:

its not nothing to do with port forwarding, probably,

try these:
1.l2spell
2.you put in the server ip not your ip >.<
3.make sure no-ip is on and the face has got a blushy face next to the server ip
4.put in the right port
5. i ran out of ideas

Read full topic
